abstract: A hedge fund is fighting back against Preet Bharara. | Standard Chartered overhauls its leadership. | Hedge funds are still attracting money from big investors. | K.K.R.-backed Samson Resources hires restructuring advisers.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Hedge Fund Sues U.S. Prosecutor
